--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Sorry I may have overreacted a little. some of the others and I 
were discussing something and the character came up. about a week 
later you name your gestault the same name. It seemed to much to be a 
coincidence I'm sure you understand. Maximus Prime was my crown and 
joy in a RPG I was in with about 20 others. I may one day introduce 
this RPG to him so please change the name. (If you want information 
on my version let me know over IM. )
>   ----- Original Message -----
